__e: So Jude doesn't want his dad to know... about him and me.
Jude really hasn't been missing that long so the best I can do at this point is call a few hotels, see if he's hiding out anywhere.
You know what you said about me and Jude not having any control over our lives?
I told Jude, and he said, "What was it?" And I said it was just pretend.
Well look, anyway, um... this being Jude and Callie's first Christmas with us got me thinking about our first Christmas.
It's exactly why Jude's the wrong person for this family right now.
Jude said he needed some time off.
Jude said they've been gone for hours.
Jude needs some time alone to reflect and pray for guidance.
